item.title: Incoterms
item.description: Incoterms (International Commercial Terms) Incoterms are the recognized abbreviation for the International Chamber of Commerce Terms of Sale. The 11 Incoterms are listed below: EXW - Ex-Works, named place where shipment is available to the buyer, not loaded. The seller will not contract for any transportation. International Carriage NOT Paid by Seller FCA - Free Carrier, unloaded at the seller’s dock OR a named place where shipment is available to the international carrier or agent, not loaded.
